reactor.io.net

Interface NetServer<IN,OUT>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<NetChannel<IN,OUT>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatagramServer, NettyDatagramServer, NettyTcpServer, TcpServer, ZeroMQTcpServer

    public interface NetServer<IN,OUT>
extends Iterable<NetChannel<IN,OUT>>
    A network-aware server.
    Author:
    Jon Brisbin

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Promise<Boolean> shutdown()
      Shutdown this NetServer and complete the returned Promise when shut down.
      Promise<Boolean> start()
      Start and bind this NetServer to the configured listen port.
      NetServer<IN,OUT> start(Runnable started)
      Start and bind this NetServer to the configured listen port and notify the given Consumer when the bind operation is complete.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        forEach, iterator, spliterator

    • Method Detail

      • start

        Promise<Boolean> start()
        Start and bind this NetServer to the configured listen port.
        Returns:
        a Promise that will be complete when the NetServer is started

                        Runnable started)
        Start and bind this NetServer to the configured listen port and notify the given Consumer when the bind operation is complete.

      • shutdown

        Promise<Boolean> shutdown()
        Shutdown this NetServer and complete the returned Promise when shut down.

        a Promise that will be complete when the NetServer is shut down
